description:
Keep them comfy and sun safe, no matter the adventure. Updated with a new material, our Rapidi-T line now offers even better UV protection. The lightweight fabric also has an antimicrobial treatment, meaning more beach days and less laundry days.

  • Highly breathable polyester spandex blend
  • UPF 50+ blocks more than 98% of harmful UV rays
  • HeiQ antimicrobial treatment resists odours
  • Raglan sleeves and flatlock seams for unrestricted and comfortable movement
  • Dropped hem provides improved coverage, especially on kids that are always on the move
  • Slim fit offers excellent close-fitting coverage
name: MEC Rapidi-T Long Sleeve Sun Shirt - Children
